name: react-native-jw-media-player
summary: React-native Android/iOS plugin for JWPlayer SDK (https://www.jwplayer.com/)

info_plist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: We will use your Bluetooth for media casting.
info_plist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: We will use your Bluetooth for media casting.
info_plist.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: We will use the local network to discover Cast-enabled devices on your WiFi network.
info_plist.Privacy - Local Network Usage Descriptio: We will use the local network to discover Cast-enabled devices on your WiFi network.
info_plist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: We will use your Microphone for media casting.
